text: Ezɨ datɨrɨghɨn, ia arazir kuramɨn a gamigha an adarazigh gasɨghasɨki. Ia dagɨar dafar mam gisɨn an 70plan otaribav soghezɨ, me ariaghire. Ezɨ gumazir kam Abimelek, ia a gamizɨma, a Sekemɨn gumazir dapanibar atrivimɨn oto. A guizɨn Jerubalɨn amuimɨn otarim pu. Puvatɨ. A Jerubalɨn ingangarir amizir kɨnim otezir borim. Ezɨ ia ghaze, a ian anabamɨn adarasi, egha anemɨsevezɨ a ian atrivimɨn otivasa.
